sources.title: Nicolet Bankshares - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Nicolet Bankshares, Inc. is a U.S. regional bank holding company based in Green Bay, Wisconsin. They are the parent company of Nicolet National Bank, the second largest Wisconsin-based bank. [1] [2] As of June 30, 2021, it had over $6.1 billion in assets. [3] History.
